content:
Excellent! I'm glad you're committed to making exercise a regular part of your routine. Remember, consistency is key, and it's great that you're aiming to exercise three times a week.

By incorporating strength training exercises into your routine, you'll be able to improve your overall fitness and see progress over time. Don't forget to listen to your body and make adjustments as needed. If you need to take an extra day off or modify an exercise, that's okay! The most important thing is that you're making progress and having fun.

Remember to also pay attention to your nutrition and recovery. A balanced diet and proper rest can help support your exercise routine and aid in muscle recovery. Make sure to fuel your body with healthy foods, stay hydrated, and get enough sleep.

If you have any more questions or need any further guidance, feel free to ask. I'm always here to help. You got this!

Keep me updated on your progress, and don't hesitate to reach out if you need any motivation or advice. You're doing great, and I'm rooting for you!
